text: Ana hu'negu nagri Anumzamo antahintahi namige'na, ugota kva vahe'ene amne vahe'enena nagate nofite hu'na zamagia krena erinte fatgo huku ke huge'za eme atru hu'naze. Hanki anama hute'na, Babiloni kinafinti'ma atre'za ese'ma e'naza vahe'mokizmi zamagima krente'naza avontafe kena erifore hu'noe. Amanahu hu'za ana avontafepina zamagia krente'naze.
